summary: The module provides utilities for analyzing two‑qubit unitary operators using their local invariants. It includes functions to compute the invariant quantities of a two‑qubit gate and to test whether two gates are equivalent up to local (single‑qubit) operations.
business_intent: Facilitate quantum circuit synthesis and optimization by allowing developers to classify and compare two‑qubit gates based on their intrinsic properties, enabling more efficient gate decomposition and hardware‑aware compilation.
